00031 namespace pwiz {
00032 namespace analysis {
00033 
00034 
00035 using namespace msdata;
00036 
00037 
00038 /// simple structure for holding Spectrum info 
00039 struct SpectrumInfo
00040 {
00041     /// structure for Precursor info 
00042     struct PrecursorInfo
00043     {
00044         size_t index;
00045         double mz;
00046         double intensity;
00047         double charge;
00048 
00049         PrecursorInfo() : index(0), mz(0), intensity(0), charge(0) {}
00050     };
00051 
00052     size_t index;
00053     std::string id;
00054     std::string nativeID;
00055     int scanNumber;
00056     CVID massAnalyzerType;
00057     int scanEvent;
00058     int msLevel;
00059     double retentionTime; // seconds
00060     std::string filterString;
00061     double mzLow;
00062     double mzHigh;
00063     double basePeakMZ;
00064     double basePeakIntensity;
00065     double totalIonCurrent;
00066     std::vector<PrecursorInfo> precursors;
00067     std::vector<MZIntensityPair> data;
00068 
00069     SpectrumInfo()
00070     :   index(0), scanNumber(0), massAnalyzerType(CVID_Unknown), scanEvent(0), 
00071         msLevel(0), retentionTime(0), mzLow(0), mzHigh(0), basePeakMZ(0), 
00072         basePeakIntensity(0), totalIonCurrent(0)
00073     {}
00074 
00075     void update(const Spectrum& spectrum);
00076 };
00077

00079 } // namespace analysis
